name: iMemory
description: iMemory - This is a logical game designed to train the memory and attention of the player.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7,8,10 Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU Dual Core Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7,8,10 Processor: Core i3 or higher Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB Storage: 100 MB available space
